1.text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hands fisted at your sides.

2.text: Sweep your arms to the left, with your left arm in front and your right one behind your body.

3.text: Push your hips to the right while swinging your arms up to the left.

4.text: Pull both arms back to the right and swing your hips through.

5.text: Sweep both arms down in front of your body to the left.

6.text: Swing your arms to the right with the right one in front of your body and the left behind you, while pushing your hips to the left.

7.text: Repeat swinging your hips and arms, increasing speed.

8.text: Play fast-paced music to help you keep the beat.

9.text: Dress up like a Fortnite player if you want to get into character.

10.text: Do the floss dance at parties once you feel confident enough.
